tagline: Essential resources for our brand identity

primary.description: The primary logo should be used in most applications where the brand is prominently featured.

dark.description: The dark version should be used on light backgrounds for maximum contrast.

light.description: The light version should be used on dark backgrounds for maximum contrast.

icon.description: The icon-only version can be used for favicons, app icons, or when space is limited.

guidelines: Maintain clear space around the logo equal to the height of the logo mark
Don't stretch or distort the logo
Use the appropriate version for different backgrounds
The minimum size for the logo is 40px in height
Always use the vector version when possible for maximum quality

typography.intro: Our typography system is designed to create clear visual hierarchy and ensure readability across all platforms.

body.name: Regular text
body.example: This is regular body text used for most content.

body.name: Medium emphasis
body.example: This text has medium emphasis for important information.

body.name: Strong emphasis
body.example: This text has strong emphasis for critical information.

body.name: Small text
body.example: This smaller text is used for captions and supporting information.

heading.title: Heading Font Family
heading.description: Used for all headings, titles, and prominent text elements to establish visual hierarchy.
heading.sample: Aa Bb Cc Dd Ee Ff Gg Hh Ii Jj

body.title: Body Font Family
body.description: Used for body text, paragraphs, and general content to ensure optimal readability.
body.sample: Aa Bb Cc Dd Ee Ff Gg Hh Ii Jj

guidelines: Maintain consistent use of typography across all brand materials
Use appropriate heading levels to establish clear content hierarchy
Ensure sufficient contrast between text and background colors
Avoid using more than two font weights in a single design
Maintain appropriate line length for optimal readability (50-75 characters)
